thread.title: Portugal begins granting citizenship to Sephardic Jews, 5 centuries after persecution
thread.title_full: Portugal begins granting citizenship to Sephardic Jews, 5 centuries after persecution

title: Portugal begins granting citizenship to Sephardic Jews, 5 centuries after persecution
text:
Published By: Fox News: World - Today 
Portugal has started granting citizenship rights to the descendants of Jews it persecuted five centuries ago....
